tidbits.title: Great Lakes Region
tidbits.description: Burundi is situated in the Great Lakes region of Africa, characterized by stunning landscapes, fertile valleys, and a portion of Lake Tanganyika, one of Africa's Great Lakes.

tidbits.title: Cultural Traditions
tidbits.description: The country boasts rich cultural traditions, including vibrant drumming performances, intricate basket weaving, and traditional dances like the famous Intore dance.

tidbits.title: Challenging History
tidbits.description: Burundi has faced challenges stemming from ethnic tensions, but ongoing efforts aim to foster unity, reconciliation, and stability for a peaceful future.
